original_text: And Joshua wrote these words in the book of the law of God, and took a great stone, and set it up there under an oak, that was by the sanctuary of the Lord.
korean_text: 여호수아가 이 모든 말씀을 하나님의 율법책에 기록하고 큰 돌을 가져다가 거기 여호와의 성소 곁에 있는 상수리나무 아래에 세우고

sentences.original_text: in the book of the law of God
and set it up there under an oak
that was by the sanctuary of the Lord
